rule.description: Deploys an AWS EventBridge Rule. Rules can be used to 1) respond to state changes in AWS and 2) trigger actions on a predetermined schedule.

name.description: A unique name to identify the rule.

schedule_expression.description: The scheduling expression. For example, “cron(0 20 * * ? *)” or “rate(5 minutes). Specify either schedule_expression or event_pattern, not both.

event_pattern.description: The event pattern. For more information, see https://docs.aws.amazon.com/eventbridge/latest/userguide/eb-event-patterns.html. Specify either schedule_expression or event_pattern, not both.

targets.description: The targets to update or add to the rule. You may set up to 5 per rule. A set of key-value pairs where the key is a memorable name for your target and the value is an object containing the configuration for said target.

[a_memorable_name_for_your_target].description: The resource to be invoked when this rule is triggered.

arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the target.

role_arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role to be used for this target when the rule is triggered. If one rule triggers multiple targets, you can use a different IAM role for each target.

input.description: Valid JSON text passed to the target. In this case, nothing from the event itself is passed to the target.

input_path.description: The value of the JSONPath that is used for extracting part of the matched event when passing it to the target. You may use JSON dot notation or bracket notation.

dead_letter_queue_arn.description: The ARN of the target queue to send dead-letter queue events to.

maximum_retry_attempts.description: The maximum number of retry attempts to make before the request fails.

maximum_event_age_in_seconds.description: The maximum amount of time, in seconds, to continue to make retry attempts.

http_path_parameter_values.description: The path parameter values to be used to populate API Gateway API or EventBridge ApiDestination path wildcards ("*").

http_header_parameters.description: The headers that need to be sent as part of request invoking the API Gateway API or EventBridge ApiDestination.

http_query_string_parameters.description: The query string keys/values that need to be sent as part of request invoking the API Gateway API or EventBridge ApiDestination.

role_arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role to associate with the rule.

event_bus_name.description: The name or ARN of the event bus to associate with this rule.

tags.description: The tags to attach to this rule

arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the rule

role_arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role associated with the rule.

event_bus_name.description: The name or ARN of the event bus associated with this rule.

examples.notes: A Rule that keeps a lambda warm by pinging it on a predetermined schedule
